text: Great example of modern Bali architecture with modern, clean, spacious, private rooms upstairs and relaxed, open air living space downstairs. Pool was good size, refreshing and had really cool "indian" tiling. Ambient lighting of the pool very funky too. Breakfast was great (got choice of pancakes or savoury - both with fresh fruit) amd made to your order. Close to Padma road and all the action, but a little bit back so away from hustle and bustle.
title: Cool architecture, unique experience

text: This is our second stay here.This time with kids and did they love it.Pool was the focus of my kids while we watched 3 D movies.Staff knew our names when we arrived and extremely hospitable . My kids wanted to take back to Australia with them,they loved Agus,Gede and Nyoman.Breakfast was always delicious too.
title: Heavenly stay

text: Just such nice beds we both slept so well and waking up to cooked breakfast in your villa was like a continuous Dream.We enjoyed pool every morning after breakfast.We were so spoilt with great service and friendly people that were staying in other villas.WE DID NOT WANT TO LEAVE.
title: Great sleep

text: They had building constructions happening (new villas being built) that started at 7 am everyday until some nights as late as 10pm! Also when swimming could not help but feel uncomfortable as the workers from the building site could see into our villa which meant no privacy at all in our week long stay! Also our neighbours who was in fact the owners son and friends were up every night until late being extremely loud that loud in fact that I could hear them from our villa with doors closed and tv on! Was not impressed when I have paid $1800 for one week here yet cant relax or rest, and also not happy as its my last holiday before having a baby! Staff here are amazing but noise levels are horrible!! I have been lucky to fall asleep before 2.30am and am woken between 6.30 and 7.30am! If I knew works were being done differently would not of stayed here!
title: Wasn't a nice peaceful holiday

text:
My family and I had a great stay at Beautiful Bali Villas. We were picked up from the airport from a  very friendly staff member who was very friendly.  Once arriving at the Villas I was very impressed!! The villa was very luxurious with a pool spacious bedrooms with en suits.  The only hard thing was getting the kids out of the pool.  Very close to the surf as well, only a 5 min walk to legian beach and close to Seminyak.

We will defiantly be back thank you to Beautiful Bali Villas and the staff for your hospitality.
title: Best Villas in Bali

text: My girlfriend and I were recommended Beautiful Bali Villas by a good friend, and we were very pleased with the experience. The staff was great, the property was gorgeous, with great pools to relax in. We were there for a weekend trip and was very satisfied. The breakfasts were great to get you going in the morning. Would highly recommend this place for couples or families.
title: Great Experience

text:
Good:
Very nice strategic place, good value for money. Stayed at 3rooms private villa for 6pax, (AC, bathroom, TV each room), very well managed, clean, spacious. 
Open concept living room with home theatre system and tv with int'l channels, overlooking nice pool. Breakfast was cooked by staffs in the villa every morning.
Towels, linens changed daily.
24h security guard and CCTV.
Staffs very helpful and polite.
Try to accomodate and answer every needs/ questions.
Also helped with motorbike renting, airport transport arrangement, in-villa party arrangement if u ever wanna hold one!
Location very near to Legian Beach, less than 10mins walk, 2mins by motorbike. To Kuta about 10mins, KuDeTa-15mins all by motorbike.
Relatively safe at night.

Bad:
Initially booked other villa but was transferred here due to some management issue (we didnt pay prebooking online, so only pay upon checkout). Was told about it when we reached the prebooked villa. Not much fuss in between transfer tho!
Tap water felt a bit 'too treated, too chlorinized' with almost 'soapy' sensation after washing.

Overall, it's a villa worth living. Giving us good memories as 1st timers in Bali. Will come back!
title: Overall : will come back again!

text:
We have a connecting villa for 2 family and it was great. The pool was great and simple breakfast every day. Staff was helpful too. Requested the staff to help us find a cake and do put in our fridge as a surprise for my mom. They help us buy a simple small cake and provide us the receipt. 

The only bad point is the location is not v good for ladies group who want to walk out as its a bit dark. If u have arrange for transport for all trips that Should be fine.

It would be good if u do yr home work to get a driver 1st and plan yr itinerary 1st before u reach bali to save time.
title: Great place for relax and chill.

photos.caption: Great breakfast but a bit limited. Maybe can have more variety.  But the cooks come at whatever

text:
With so many choices of places to stay in Bali my friends and I are glad we chose well with Beautiful Bali Villas. Our stay at the villas exceeded our expectations. The villa, pool, bedrooms and bathrooms were all very well maintained and clean. To be able to come home from the beach (5 min walk away) and jump into your own pool was a refreshing feature and having your own outdoor entertaining, dining and kitchen area meant that we never felt like we were couped up in a hotel room, rather there was always plenty of space and fully air conditioned bedrooms with TV / DVD should we need somewhere cooler.

What we particularly enjoyed about the villa was the staff. All staff were very friendly and the security at the Villas was great. Each morning the staff would cook breakfast in the villa's kitchen and without fail we would awake to breakfast (hot or cold) ready on the table. Each evening we would come home to find that the rooms had been prepared for the evening - bed turned down and air con on. A nice touch.

Looking forward to our next stay here!
title: Looking forward to staying again!

text:
Beautiful bali villas really lives up to its name. Plenty of room and well kept living areas. Pool was amazing, and staff were super helpful and extremely friendly. 
Great location, close to plenty of shops and restaurants, and 5 min walk to the beach!
title: Wonderful experience

text:
We arrived to find our villa not yet ready so we spent half a day wandering around Legian which is a short 20m stroll, but down a dark laneway. To finally get into the 3 bedroom Villa was heaven. The pool is amazing, the kitchen and dining are clean and open. Bedrooms were simple and each with their own safe. Although the hot water doesn't last that long when six people are showering. 
Breakfasts and the staff were the highlights, they could never do enough to assist you. Birthday cake and food orders were beyond positive.
The one big negative, right at the end, which left us with a sour taste was that the charge for two broken glasses was 100K. $10 for two simple glasses.
title: Beautiful and clean

text: With alot of searching and long hours planning our honeymoon we found beautiful bali villas and loved the look of it and lets just say the pictures don't do it justice.  The staff were amazing willing to help orgaise transport for day trips and breakfast daily was perfect. We had to spend our first 2 nights in another villa in seminyak but it was gorgeous and the staff was great aswell. perfect location and a pool to die for, we couldn't have asked for anything else. Will definitely return happy honeymooners :)
title: Perfect location for a perfect honeymoon:)

text:
We are 2 young families travelling with 2 young babies. Beautiful Bali was supposed to be our second stop after Ubud. Being a paranoid traveller I had even called and emailed the villa 1 week before the stay to confirmed our reservation.

The day before our supposed stay at Beautiful Bali, we got an email saying that there's a problem with our credit card transaction, and that they're moving us to another place in Seminyak.

We of course refused and offered to provide another credit card to confirm the booking, or to pay upfront using the card upon arrival. The manage had refused and said that the villa is not booked by other guests, and our only option is Seminyak.

After a long quarrel on the phone, the manager then changed his stance and say that we can stay at Beautiful Bali, but we'll have to pay cash in full upon arrival. (probably planning to pull the same stunt to the other guests??)

Furious and worry that this disgruntled settlement might post a threat to us if we decide to continue to stay there, we've asked for cancellation. The manager then promptly asked us to settle the cancellation with bookings.com where we original booked the villa, to avoid charges.

Upon checking with bookings, we were told that the reason the transaction didn't go through in the first place is that the villa does not take AMEX!

Why couldn't they tell us earlier and avoid all the inconvinience! Instead they chose to be dodgy and move us to another location the last minute?
title: Last minute relocation

text:
We stayed for a week at Beautiful Bali Villas.

We had a great time - the place is beautiful, the staff are friendly and helpful and the location made it easy to organise small tours and outings.

Will definitely be going back...
title: Had a great time

text: We have been to bali many times and the padma St location suits us for restaurants and shopping. So that was a major factor in choosing Beautiful bali villas. The villa itself was very large and clean, with the villa been less than a year old everything was modern. Another great feature is the pool which in bali are often too warm this pool however was perfect temp. As we were traveling with a toddler we got a pool fence erected which was brilliant. The breakfasts were great each morning I recommend the mie goreng and the staff were always happy to help but kept there distance when you didn’t need them, on 3 nights we got food delivered which the staff were happy to help with. If you are looking for a villa within a very short walk to heaps of restaurants and bars this is for you. The negatives for the villa was the stepping stone access I think this could be improved as it was a hassle to negotiate with a stroller and a night. I would defiantly recommend this villa to friends and family. After you way up all the cost involved I believe renting a villa is a cheaper option than the larger resorts.
title: Great Location

text:
Came here with 3 other friends, was greeted by a group of extremely friendly and down-to-earth staff which left great first impressions.

Things got even better when we got directed to our villa for the first time. Saw the home theatre system, dining table and a kitchen ... all right next to a beautifully lit pool.

Staff came in and made a beautiful breakfast every morning, with the option of an american breakfast, pancakes, nasi goreng, you name it! Also did an exceptional job with room service every day.

Would recommend this hidden gem in Bali to anybody!
title: Amazing accomodation!

text: My friend and I stayed at Beautiful Bali Villas for 10 days. The villa was very clean, comfortable and spacious. We really enjoyed the private pool and the entertainment system provided. We found that the air conditioners and ceiling fans did a good job. All of the staff working at the villas were very friendly and helpful. The location was good. Only a short walk to Jalan Legian and approximately a ten minute walk to the beach. We really enjoyed our stay here and we'll definitely be back!
title: Great place to stay!

text:
We booked through Agoda to stay in a 2 bedroom Villa back in July. The transaction was finalised, paid in full at the time of booking and we received both a confirmation and notification that a courtesy vehicle would be at DPS airport to escort my husband and our two children to the Villa on the day of our arrival (mid October). 

Upon arriving in Bali we waited out front of the airport for a good 30 minutes and there was of course no vehicle nor driver. We then organised our own transport to the Villa, with our booking confirmation and receipt in hand, only to be greeted at the reception desk out front to be told there was no booking under our name. Having heard of the recent trend of Villas being booked and not existing - or people being seriously ripped off we of course began to worry - immediately. This is not a 'cheap' villa by any stretch so we believed we had done our homework properly., 

We spent the next 20 minutes trying to sort out the issue. A manager was called and we were then told by phone that the Villa we had booked and paid for had been 'double booked'and that we were being moved to Seminyak - and we were given no choice in the matter. We were told that it was simply a mistake and that a driver would collect us soon. We were devastated, upset, had children who had travelled all day and no idea of where or what we would be staying in in Seminyak. 

Upon the driver arriving and transferring us to another Villa called 'Villa Bugus' we were taken to Villa Mimpi where we stayed for the first week of our trip. Rather than being located in Legian it was down an alley way behind Bintang Supermarket. Whilst we have no complaints regarding Villa Mimpi had we have wanted to stay in Seminyak for the first week of our holiday we would have booked there. Simple. We in fact moved to a hotel in Seminyak for our second week which was orginally why we booked to stay in Legian in the first place. 

To be honest, we are not the type to complain - in fact we never have, BUT 'double booking'us and no one having the decency to inform us when mobile numbers and email addresses were provided is a total joke. Rather than starting our holiday relaxed we were completely thrown in at the deep end with no party wanting to take any responsibilty. I have travelled to Bali several times a year for the past 25 years and this is the worst service to date. 

In future i would absolutely NOT recommend people to book and stay at the Beautiful Bali Villa's, i am sure in fact they are lovely - alas that was an experience we were not afforded and the whole passing of the buck was a complete joke.
title: DOUBLE BOOKED- NOT NOTIFIED! Never Again!

text: it was our end of financial year party so the Boss decided to take us to Bali.He reckons we made him Richer We had two villas.Beautiful Bali Villas turn out to be much better then we were expecting.Pool was central to our Villa.Furniture is modern and tasteful.Butler service is prompt and Keen and we went to Jimbaran and Ubud.Staff arranged the tours and i was incharge of Tours.Gede the butler made it a breze for me.Tour was a bit too long in traffic but that is Bali.It is possible  and would love to  return to these Villas.We have to make the boss rich again.

text:
We are two couples from Spain who stayed for 5 days in villa one. The private villa pool was brilliant and the surrounding deck for the sun lounges was very relaxing. We liked the privacy of the villa and the full kitchen if we wanted to have the option to cook for ourselves at night.

The breakfast prepared by our butler was satisfying and a good start to each day, I really liked their pancakes. The villa is close to the shopping district of Legian so it was an easy walk to the shops and beach for us. 

The front desk helped us organise some day activities which we appreciated. I would have liked a gym, but there is one located not far from the villa.

It was a shame that it rained for some of the days, but we have a new favorite!
title: Lovely part of Bali paradise

text:
For the price that we are paying for $998 SGD (after all taxes incl.), this villa served quite its purpose, other than a few disappointments. What you see is what you get. 

The location is quite off the beaten tracks but yet we still managed to hear the passing of motor vehicles from our villa (we stayed in Villa 2). And since it was near an alley with passing motor cycles and cars, it was not as private or quiet as expected. The villa floors were also pretty dusty, which we managed to get our butler to assist to mop up the floors. Do be careful while making your way in to the Villa as the path in are made stone steps with gaps in between and its quite dangerous at night when its dimly lit. 

Beautiful Bali Villas get their water supply from undergrounds sources which gave an "oily" after-feel every time after washing up. The room floors were in parquet and its pretty "oily" & "slippery" so do be careful when walking in the rooms. Would suggest brushing your teeths with mineral water or drinking water instead (not sure if its perfectly safe for oral usage). 

The fans in living and dining areas were strong, pretty cooling for Bali's scorching weather. But the aircons in the rooms were pretty weak. Even though we switched it to the lowest with the max fans speed, it took quite a while for the room to cool. 

WiFi connection was weird. Even though we stayed in Villa 2 (which supposedly we are supposed to connect to Villa 2's WiFI since the signal was best) we are constantly unable to log-in. We had to used connections from other Villas (eg VIlla 1 & 4) which didnt had signals as good but was still able to log in with. 

Breakfast is minimal. You are able to have a choice of American (1 sausage, scrambled eggs, toast), Indonesian (mee goreng which is made from their local Indomie), Continental (1 banana pancake). Dont expect much, but if you would like more you can buy your own ingredients and get your butlers to cook for you (we bought our own bacon for the 2nd morning). They do provide fruits daily (papaya, watermelon, honeydew). 

But this Villas boasted their hospitality. Our personal assistant was Gede and he was very patient with our request (we did an inhouse massage on our 3rd night and he was very prompt and patient in checking the prices for us, walking to and fro frm the front desk to our villas from his front desk etc). Not only just him, his colleagues were all smiley and very helpful. 

I especially love the pool and the fact that you are able to watch tv (located in the living area) while swimming in the pool. And the boys enjoyed the vast programmes and 3D movies the living room tv offered. 

Drinking water is readily available with a dispenser for hot/cold water, so you do not need to worry about lugging in bottles of drinking water or boiling hot water for your beverages. 

Overall, it was not the best Villa experience we expected for the price paid but the hospitality from the staff was commendable.
title: Not bad but not the best

photos.caption: Not bad but not the best

text: As we are a busy working couple, we needed a break. Through one of our friends we booked at Beautiful Bali Villas. It has offered us all we need, the lovely environment of the villa, privacy, well trained staff,helpful, kindly. Located very strategic, in walking distance to restaurants, shops and beach. Definitely will come back!

text: 第2次来Bali岛，总共住了6晚，说下整体感受吧，优点：酒店位置确实还可以，去各种shopping Mall或者海滩，餐馆都不远，打车都在20分钟以内。周边吃饭的地方也很多，工作人员挺热情的，早餐还算丰盛。 缺点：酒店设施有些陈旧了，明显年久失修，卫生条件没有达到我认为的4星酒店的标准。 总结：在这家酒店度过了非常愉快的6晚，跟家人一起度假，酒店也没有特别的重要，考虑性价比，还是值得推荐的酒店，如果未来设施能够翻新也会再考虑入住。

owner_response.text:

text:
J'ai séjourné avec des amis dans une villa 3 chambres avec piscine. Le service est excellent et l'accueil chaleureux. La maison est vraiment très propre, ce qui est vraiment agréable ! Chaque chambre est équipée d'une salle de bain et de la climatisation.

Nous avons apprécié la location de la villa, en plein Legian et tout proche de Seminyak ! ( + 10 min de la plage) Idéal mais reste également situé dans une impasse très calme :)

Mention spéciale pour les pancakes à la banane au petit déjeuner... un délice !
title: Une villa propre et un service 5 étoiles !

text:
３名で9月12日から15日までAgotaを介してインターネット（Agotaのサイト）でBeautiful Bali Villas に宿泊予約をとりました。15日帰りのフライトが21時を過ぎるためチェックアウトを１８時にしました。
『　Remark:additionalNote:に現地の言葉で　saya mau cek out jam 6 sore　』　
『　備考　　追加事項　　　　　　　　　　　午後6時にチェックアウト　　』
特別なリクエストは、ホテル側の状況により保障できない場合がございますのでご了承下さい。

結果として、13日の朝にホテルの係員より「15日のチェックアウトは、12時になります。」と報告がありました。

①	ホテルの状況によりチェックアウトが午後6時までにできない場合、事前にお客様に報告をして了承を得る必要がある。できないのであれば予約しません。現地に行き一泊した後「チェックアウトの時間を変更できません」は考えられない。

私は、15日のチェックアウトを１８時にできないのであればここをキャンセルして他のホテルに移りたいと希望しました。

13日の夕方に日本人アシスタントマネージャー小野寺涼よりBeautiful Bali Villas　では15日の午後滞在できないのでほかのホテルに移って頂けますかと提案されましたので、そのお勧めのホテルを見て確認し了承しました。その後連絡があり、おすすめのホテルは予約で一杯との連絡がありました。

②	日本人アシスタントマネージャー小野寺涼は何をしているのか、間違いを指摘する以前の問題だ。

14日から宿泊をキャンセルして別のホテルに変わりました。

③　「キャンセルの返金はAgotaを通して行ってください。」と日本人アシスタントマネージャー小野寺涼から指示されましたが、返金はされませんでした。きちんと説明するところを説明できていない。お客様に迷惑をかけても理由も言わないのでは全く納得できません。
title: 小野寺涼の対応が最悪

owner_response.text:
ビューティフルバリヴィラスにお泊り頂きありがとうございました。またご滞在中にご希望通りの対応が行われず申し訳ございませんでした。
ご予約はAGODAを通して頂いておりましたが、ご予約証の記載にもある通り、備考の箇所にはホテル側の状況により保障できない場合があるという旨は明記されております。すなわちAGODAの予約上でもレイトチェックアウトのご利用は予約時に確約をしておりません。
ご到着の１２日の晩は深夜でしたので、翌朝１３日にグリーティングをさせて頂いております。１５日はレイトチェックアウトがご利用できない旨、また宿泊をキャンセルして他のホテルへ移動される場合も当日キャンセルと同様の規定によりご返金は出来ない為、代案として弊社で管理をしている近隣のレンタルヴィラをご紹介させて頂き送迎車にてお連れさせて頂きました。当初のご希望で１５日のチェックアウト後にデイユースでご利用できるヴィラということで利用できる別のヴィラを紹介致しましたが、残念ながら１４日からはこちらのヴィラも予約が入っている為、ご利用は不可能でした。
１日早く出られて他のホテルへ移動されることとなりましたが、１日分の宿泊キャンセルは当日キャンセルと同様で返金はできかねます。この件につきまして返金に応じない場合はインターネットのレビュー上に書き込みをされるということを、先日お電話でも頂きましたがそのような対応は致しかねますのでご理解頂ければ幸いでございます。
レンタルヴィラにご宿泊をされるお客様には、公平に誠意をもって対応をさせて頂いております。
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik
